GSD.description:
PM: hibernate: defer device probing when resuming from hibernation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 2f0e18e0db42f4f8bc87d3d98333680065ceeff8. For more details please see the references link.
